channel.title: How do you change font colors
channel.description:
i need to know how to change font colors like the blue in the chat box to white, and yellow above character to red.
http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,256209.0.html see how the type is in pink?

item.title: How do you change font colors
item.dc:creator: @Krip_Pk Krip Pk
item.description:
@Krip_Pk wrote:

well i know that, but im talking like in the client when you type its blue in the chat box, i need that to be white how would i change it in the CLIENT.

Read full topic
item.source: How do you change font colors

item.title: How do you change font colors
item.dc:creator: @Da_0wnz Da 0wnz
item.description:
@Da_0wnz wrote:

well I dont really know what your talking about but Ill take a stab at it?
@red@ = red
@bla@ = black
@whi@ = white
@lre@ = orange
@blu@ = blue
@yel@ = yellow
@cya@ = cyan
and etc…

Ok say I wanted to make something say Welcome to Lava Burn Isle in white heres what I would do:

  1. Find what you want to be in color (mine would be lava burn isle)
    and then here is an example of what to do
@whi@Welcome to Lava Burn Isle

And if you wanted to make it multiple colors say you want to make lava in red burn in orange and isle in blue heres what you would do…

Welcome to @red@Lava @lre@Burn @blu@Isle

Read full topic
item.source: How do you change font colors
